project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts while storing them in a JSON file and interacting through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the feature to add contacts to the contact book
Implement the feature to search for contacts in the contact book
Implement the feature to update existing contacts in the contact book
Implement the feature to delete contacts from the contact book
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
